mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pubmap.raw_pubmap(pmid, article_xml, user_name, megxbar, created, geom) VALUES (#{pmid}, xmlparse(document #{articleXML}), #{userName},to_json(#{megxBarJSON}),#{created}, ST_PointFromText('POINT(${lon} ${lat})',4326))
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT true FROM pubmap.raw_pubmap WHERE pmid=#{pmid})
